attributes.additional_details: This petition is to help our country in the banning or making the balif and debt collecting companies illegal , they take a very high percent of our countries money pushing England in to a rescission , countless reports of intimidation and threats and bailiffs lies to get money from individuals who struggle day by day ,, this petition is calling out to help get this stopped .
attributes.background: Bailiffs, they put our country in to recession and they ruin peoples lives , they take possessions and leave people broke , bailiffs are aggressive and intimidate people on a daily basis , bailiffs charge exceeding amounts from very small debts , they take and leave people with nothing .
